text: Although the U.S. is close to having a #COVID19 #vaccine, concerns remain about #vaccine safety. @ejyager @acphsofficial Center for Biopharmaceutical Education and Training, spoke w/ @Tech_Networks @rjmsci to explain why #vaccines are safe. https://t.co/odDU5w3oW2 @mollyrcampbell https://t.co/kGdr1uN7li
